description: UMD 4..1.6.1 revision contaning updates for the CVMFS and default configurations.&nbsp; &nbsp;
releaseNotes: UMD 4..1.6.1 revision contaning updates for the CVMFS and default configurations.&nbsp; &nbsp;
installationNotes: <span style="color: rgb(102, 102, 102); font-family: sans-serif; font-size: 12.8369px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">All products in UMD 4.16.1 were verified against EGI's current Quality Criteria. Installation and configuration notes are available in the EGI repository.</span>
contact: For further information about the distribution, its goals and surrounding processes, and more information about how to engage as a Technology Provider with EGI, please send an Email to: operations (at) egi.eu.
technicalContact: <span style="color: rgb(102, 102, 102); font-family: sans-serif; font-size: 12.8369px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">For any bugs and issues you encounter that are not described in the release notes of this release, or the related documentation provided by the Technology Providers, please visit the EGI Helpdesk (https://ggus.eu/) to make a report.</span>
knownIssues: <span style="color: rgb(102, 102, 102); font-family: sans-serif; font-size: 12.8369px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">No Known issues found during the release process</span>
changeLog: <ul><li><font color="#666666" face="sans-serif"><span style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);"><span style="font-size: 12.8369px;">CVMFS 2.9.2&nbsp;&nbsp;is a patch release for&nbsp;release of 2.9.1 which contained an issue preventing rebuilding of source RPM</span></span></font></li><li><font color="#666666" face="sans-serif"><span style="font-size: 12.8369px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">CVMFS-CONFIG 2.6.1 EGI new default cvmfs egi configuration&nbsp;</span></font></li><li><font color="#666666" face="sans-serif"><span style="font-size: 12.8369px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">EGI-CVMFS 4.2.update for hte&nbsp;</span><span style="font-size: 12.8369px;">&nbsp;meta-package to install the CernVM File System (cvmfs) version 2.9.2 configured for EGI.</span></font></li></ul>

products.name: cernvm.cvmfs-egi-config
products.description: This is the metapackage for the EGI configuration of CernVM File System (CernVM-FS).

products.name: cernvm.cvmfs
products.description: CernVM File System (CernVM-FS) is a network file system based on HTTP and optimized to deliver experiment software in a fast, scalable, and reliable way. Files and file metadata are aggressively cached and downloaded on demand. Thereby the CernVM-FS decouples the life cycle management of the application software releases from the operating system. CernVM-FS is included in CernVM, however it can also be used outside CernVM.

products.name: cernvm.egi-cvmfs
products.description: This is the metapackage for the EGI configuration of CernVM File System (CernVM-FS).
